attributes.action: Sack the Archers editor -licensce payers must  revolt
attributes.additional_details: The current editor of the Archers ( or should that be  Arrghchers?)  needs to be sacked . The everydale tale of  country folk, management of stories and actors  have  recently lead to an unbelivable acting,  siloed   tales ,  and overall excoriating  listening exprience which, as a licence fee payer, I object to.  It has become oversensationalised and brings  characters in and out  willy-nilly in a bizarre manner creating   a  totally disconnected experience
